pages.text: 這個反應爐是一個主要生產能量的多方塊機器，。$(br2)一個多方塊機器是由各種方塊組成。$(br2)製作反應堆並為其提供動力你需要黃鈾錠，所以馬上去挖些黃鈾礦然後熔煉它！

To build your first Reactor you need to craft the following Basic Reactor blocks:$(br2)$(li)22x Casing$(li)1x Controller$(li)1x Control Rod$(li)1x Fuel Rod$(li)1x Solid Access Port$(li)1x Active Forge Energy Power Tap$(br2)The Glass block is actually optional and can be replaced by another Casing block.

pages.title: Forge Power Tap
pages.text: Once you have crafted all the required blocks, you are ready to build your first Reactor.$(br2)Place the blocks in your world using the following diagram, putting the Fuel Rod in the center with a Casing below.
如果全部正常，當你放置最後一個方塊時反應爐將會形成現在你可以右鍵開啟控制器的表面。$(br2)如果沒有發生任何事，右鍵任何你放置的方塊：你將會等得到一個解釋錯誤的訊息。一旦你成功修復它，你應該擁有一個成型的反應爐或者其他錯誤訊息。

Now that your Reactor is ready, it's time to put some fuel in it.$(br2)Pick up more Yellorium ingots and right-click on the Solid Access Port. Set the Port to Inlet mode and place your ingots in the input slot.$(br2)The ingots will be quickly consumed by the Reactor and turned into fuel.$(br2)Open the Controller interface and turn your Reactor on!

As the Reactor heats up, energy is slowly being produced and the internal energy buffer filled.$(br2)To use the energy stored inside the Reactor you need to connect some sort of energy pipe or a machine to the Active Forge Power Tap.$(br)The Power Tap will send out energy to the connected block (if it can accept it)
恭喜，你已經建造你的第一個反應爐！$(br2)使用它生產所有前期遊戲你需要的能量然後繼續建造其他反應爐和渦輪在你已經讀完剩餘的部分
